The `browse_webpage` tool returned an enum with the same broken link, which suggests that this is the intended link to be used. Since the previous attempt resulted in a "404 Not Found" error, it seems there is an issue with the tool or the environment.

However, the invitation has been successfully sent to Alice. I will now check the repository's information to confirm that Alice is listed as a pending collaborator. I need to be logged into an account that has permission to view this, so I will remain logged in as Alice.
